Subject: Re: Defending the Maximals!
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Tantrum Barely dodges the blasts, as they send him flying back. He
transforms, and lands on his feet in Bull mode, and charges towards the leg
of Lavatron, hoping to gore him, and blasting electricity out of them as he
goes.
